mapper.select: SELECT tp.STRPRIVILEGEURL AS strPrivilegeurl FROM tb_privilege tp, tb_duty_privilege tdp WHERE tdp.STRDUTYID=#{strDutyid} AND tp.STRPRIVILEGEID=tdp.STRPRIVILEGEID
SELECT tp.STRPRIVILEGEID AS strPrivilegeid FROM tb_privilege tp, tb_duty_privilege tdp WHERE tdp.STRDUTYID=#{strDutyid} AND tp.STRPRIVILEGEID=tdp.STRPRIVILEGEID
SELECT STRPRIVILEGEID AS strPrivilegeid, STRPRIVILEGENAME AS strPrivilegename, STRTOPMENUNAME AS strTopmenuname, STRPARENTID AS strParentid FROM tb_privilege ORDER BY STRINSERTTIME ASC
